code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import API from"../../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EventList=()=>{const[events,setEvents]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchEvents=async()=>{const response=await API.get("/events");setEvents(response.data);};fetchEvents();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Events"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:events.map(event=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[event.title," - ",event.date]},event.id))})]});};export default EventList;
